title: Protest in Hostages Square
description: Join us for a peaceful protest in Hostages Square to raise awareness about the current situation.
group_description: A group of university students and faculty members who are passionate about social justice.

title: American Donations Event
description: A fundraising event to support our cause in the United States.
group_description: A group of philanthropists and supporters from the United States.

title: High School awareness meeting
description: A meeting to discuss community issues and gather feedback.
group_description: A diverse group of high school students and teachers interested in community engagement.

title: Business Sector Meeting
description: A meeting to discuss business sector issues and awareness.
group_description: A group of business professionals and entrepreneurs focused on community development.

title: Army Solidarity Session
description: An interactive session to support soldiers and raise awareness of current needs.
group_description: Volunteers and speakers aiming to support active and reserve IDF personnel.
additional_notes: Bring headphones and a stable internet connection.

title: Jerusalem Unity Gathering
description: A large community event promoting unity across various sectors.
group_description: Community members and leaders from across Jerusalem.

title: Shfela Business Networking
description: A networking session for business owners to collaborate and engage.
group_description: Entrepreneurs and investors from the local community.
additional_notes: Bring promotional material for your business.

title: South Region Awareness Campaign
description: Raising awareness through storytelling and community dialogue.
group_description: Students and educators from the southern region.
additional_notes: Please arrive 15 minutes early for registration.

title: Virtual Hebrew Session for Donors
description: An online session to brief donors on progress and future plans.
group_description: Current and prospective donors interested in updates and financial transparency.
additional_notes: Session will be recorded for future access.

title: Across the Green Line University Panel
description: A panel discussion on cross-border issues affecting students.
group_description: Students and faculty from different universities discussing key concerns.
additional_notes: Questions can be submitted in advance.

title: North Sector Business Breakfast
description: Early morning meetup for business leaders in the northern region.
group_description: Business professionals aiming to expand their network.
additional_notes: Coffee and snacks will be served.

title: French Session with Religious Leaders
description: A French-language discussion with religious Zionist leaders.
group_description: Community members and leaders from French-speaking backgrounds.

title: Spanish-Language Donor Briefing
description: An exclusive update for Spanish-speaking donors.
group_description: Supporters and donors from Latin America and Spain.

title: Center Region High School Townhall
description: Townhall discussion for high school students on social activism.
group_description: Students, teachers, and youth coordinators from the central region.
additional_notes: Parental consent required for students under 18.

title: Religious Youth Virtual Rally
description: A motivational and spiritual rally for religious youth.
group_description: Young leaders and educators fostering religious values.
additional_notes: Event link will be emailed after registration.
